title: "Tables"
output: pdf_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
ddr.otu <- read.csv("tables/DDR-summary-table-otus.txt")
ddr.phylo <- read.csv("tables/DDR-summary-table-phylo.txt")
ddr.turn <- read.csv("tables/DDR-summary-table-turn.txt")
ddr.nest <- read.csv("tables/DDR-summary-table-nest.txt")
ddr.sor <- read.csv("tables/DDR-summary-table-sor.txt")
ddrs <- bind_rows(ddr.otu, ddr.phylo, ddr.turn, ddr.nest, ddr.sor)
```


```{r}
ddrs.sorted <- ddrs %>% group_by(dat, response) %>% select(metric, slope, r2, p) %>%
  arrange(dat, response) %>% mutate(sig = p<0.05)
ddrs.split <- split(ddrs.sorted, ddrs.sorted$dat)
```
